Container.Name: portainer
Container.Overview: Portaine Community Edition is an open source tool for managing container based applications across Kubernetes, Docker, Docker Swarm and Azure ACI environments. Portainer's intuitive interface, removes the complexity traditionally associated with managing container platforms. It gives users the simplicity they want without forcing them to compromise on functionality. It is used by developers, devops and infrastructure teams all over the world to simplify processes and streamline their operations.
